text: (ao mou ha meat chaur anak pol towkean mnoussa lok tha) tam pit khnhom trauv ban ke bangkeab aoy korp sakkar champoh mcheasa robsa tukdei ( mea kkah)nih del trong ban hamkhat nowknong noh . haey avei teangoasa chea kammosetthi robsa trong . haey khnhom trauv ban ke bangkeab aoy sthet nowknongchamnaom anak mou slei m
